item.title: Beogram 4000: An Entertaining Evening Exploring the Differential Stop Circuit
item.description: Before returning a refurbished unit to a customer, we put it through rigorous real-world testing. This involves playing music for several weeks to ensure consistent functionality. This listening process is a delightful part of working with Bang & Olufsen equipment, as our workshop is always filled with music! A recent case involving a restored Beogram 4000 turntable highlights the value of this testing phase. During playback, I noticed the arm occasionally failed to return to its resting position after reaching the record’s end.
